00028 void CnipolPmtHists::BookHists()
00029 {
00030    char hName[256];
00031 
00032    fDir->cd();
00033 
00034    for (int iChId=N_SILICON_CHANNELS+1; iChId<=N_SILICON_CHANNELS+4; iChId++)
00035    {
00036       string sChId("  ");
00037       sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", iChId);
00038 
00039       sprintf(hName, "hTdc_ch%02d", iChId);
00040       o[hName] = new TH1I(hName, hName, 100, 0, 100);
00041       ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetOption("hist NOIMG");
00042       ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetTitle("; TDC; Events;");
00043 
00044       sprintf(hName, "hAdcAmpltd_ch%02d", iChId);
00045       o[hName] = new TH1I(hName, hName, 255, 0, 255);
00046       ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetOption("hist NOIMG");
00047       ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetTitle("; Amplitude, ADC; Events;");
00048 
00049       sprintf(hName, "hTvsA_ch%02d", iChId);
00050       o[hName] = new TH2I(hName, hName, 255, 0, 255, 90, 0, 90);
00051       ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetOption("colz LOGZ NOIMG");
00052       ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetTitle("; Amplitude, ADC; TDC;");
00053 
00054       sprintf(hName, "hTvsI_ch%02d", iChId);
00055       o[hName] = new TH2I(hName, hName, 255, 0, 255, 90, 0, 90);
00056       ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetOption("colz LOGZ NOIMG");
00057       ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetTitle("; Integral, ADC; TDC;");
00058    }
00059 }

00063 void CnipolPmtHists::FillPassOne(ChannelEvent *ch)
00064 {
00065    UChar_t chId = ch->GetChannelId();
00066 
00067    string sChId("  ");
00068    sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", chId);
00069 
00070    ((TH1*) o["hAdcAmpltd_ch" + sChId]) -> Fill(ch->GetAmpltd());
00071    ((TH1*) o["hTdc_ch"       + sChId]) -> Fill(ch->GetTdc());
00072    ((TH1*) o["hTvsA_ch"      + sChId]) -> Fill(ch->GetAmpltd(), ch->GetTdc());
00073    ((TH1*) o["hTvsI_ch"      + sChId]) -> Fill(ch->GetIntgrl(), ch->GetTdc());
00074 }
00075

00078 void CnipolPmtHists::PostFillPassOne(DrawObjContainer *oc)
00079 {
00080    Info("PostFillPassOne", "Starting...");
00081 
00082    for (int iChId=N_SILICON_CHANNELS+1; iChId<=N_SILICON_CHANNELS+4; iChId++)
00083    {
00084       string sChId("  ");
00085       sprintf(&sChId[0], "%02d", iChId);
00086 
00087       //sprintf(hName, "hTdc_ch%02d", iChId);
00088       TFitResultPtr fitres = ((TH1*) o["hTdc_ch"+sChId])->Fit("gaus", "I M S R");
00089 
00090       if (fitres.Get()) {
00091          //chi2Ndf  = fitres->Ndf() > 0 ? fitres->Chi2()/fitres->Ndf() : -1;
00092          //sigma    = fitres->Value(0);
00093          if (iChId == 73) {
00094             gAnaMeasResult->fPmtV1T0    = fitres->Value(1);
00095             gAnaMeasResult->fPmtV1T0Err = fitres->FitResult::Error(1);
00096          } 
00097 
00098          if (iChId == 75) {
00099             gAnaMeasResult->fPmtS1T0    = fitres->Value(1);
00100             gAnaMeasResult->fPmtS1T0Err = fitres->FitResult::Error(1);
